summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or a system of additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal light and power plant and system and providing for the issuance and sale of municipal light and power revenue warrant or warrants in the principal amount of not to exceed Fifteen Million Dollars ($15,000,000) to finance in part said plan or system; and creating a warrant redemption fund for payment of principal of and interest on such warrants.
